item.title: Sabayon 15.10 press release
item.description: Image: an ancient hen-foot print found on Mars (Mars Photo credit to NASA) Sabayon 15.10 is a modern and easy to use Linux distribution based on Gentoo, following an extreme, yet reliable, rolling release model. This is a monthly release generated, tested and published to mirrors by our build servers containing the latest and greatest collection of software available in the Entropy repositories. The ChangeLog files related to this release are available on our mirrors.
